alert.note: Alert for Adair; Dallas; Guthrie; Madison (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 6:33AM CDT until August 29 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Madison County in south central Iowa... Southeastern Guthrie County in west central Iowa... Northeastern Adair County in southwestern Iowa... Southern Dallas County in central Iowa... * Until 715 AM CDT. * At 633 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stuart, or 10 miles southeast of Guthrie Center, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dexter, Diamondhead Lake and Linden around 645 AM CDT. Earlham and Redfield around 650 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Dallas Center, De Soto, Adel, Van Meter, Badger Creek State Park, Waukee, West Des Moines, Urbandale, Clive and Grimes. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 80 and 120. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
